definitions.title: adj. num. ord.
definitions.body: second;—[[בַּיּוֹם הַשֵּׁנִי]] Ex 2:13 +, etc. ([[שֵׁנִי]] 82 t. + Ne 3:30, read [[שֵׁנִית]]; read [[וְהַשֵּׁנִי]] also 1Ch 6:13 for [[ושני]]); [[בַּשָּׁנׇה]] [[הַשֵּׁנִית]] Ge 47:18 +, etc. ([[שֵׁנִית]] 72 t. + Ne 3:30 v. supr.), ´[[שִׁבְעַת יׇמִים שׁ]]: Le 13:5, Le 13:93, Le 13:54 a second heptad of days; [[שֵׁנִית]] = a second time Ge 22:15 + 16 t. + (= again, of similar—not identical—act, or another point in a series) Ez Eze 4:6, Mal 2:13, [[וְהַשֵּׁנִית]] 2Sa 16:19; † mpl. [[שְׁנִיִּם]] Nu 2:16 they shall set out as second, but Ge 6:16 second stories (in ark).
